title: Leaves from the journal of our life in the Highlands, from 1848 to 1861.
author: Victoria
snippet: Then we passed the valley of Glen Farg ; the hills are very high on each side, and completely wooded down to the bottom of the valley, where a small stream runs on one side of the road — it is really lovely.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Its structure used to be well seen by the traveller in the deep romantic valley of Glen Farg, through which the old post road to Perth winded.

title: Our coaching trip,
author: Carnegie, Andrew
snippet: Fair Perth was to be our resting-place, but be- •sore arriving there the pedestrians of the party had one of their grandest excursions, walking through beautiful Glen Farg.
